p: In the study, the enzyme PPO activity assay concluded that the highest and lowest activity was observed in CB extracts (9.67±6.39) and CR extracts (4.77±0.32), respectively, in terms of change in absorbance at 495 nm per minute/g of fresh weight, which is greater than the control used in the PPO activity assay, i.e. 3.83±3.35 ( Figure 12).
